Index.headline: Unlock the Power of Your PDFs with
Index.description: Insight is a web service for natural language chat with your PDFs, making it faster and easier to find information, summarize, and explore related topics.

benefits.title: What can Insight do for you?
benefits.subtitle: Here are some of the benefits that Insight can offer you:

benefit-1.title: Instant Information
benefit-1.description: Save time and effort by finding the information you need without having to read the whole document.

benefit-2.title: Interactive Learning
benefit-2.description: Improve your understanding and retention by asking questions and getting feedback from the AI.

benefit-3.title: Insightful Discovery
benefit-3.description: Discover new insights and connections by exploring related topics and sources suggested by the AI.

benefit-4.title: Innovative Creation
benefit-4.description: Enhance your productivity and creativity by using Insight as a tool for research, learning, and writing.
